channel.title: Comments on: SafePro Auto Glass
channel.description: Authentic and Trustworthy Reviews from REAL Customers

item.title: By: Warren Hajde

item.description: Great service on time quick and friendly Service Date 7-29-22 Thank you
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: charlie archuleta
item.dc:creator: charlie archuleta
item.description: After a rock hit my windshield,the nick started,to turn into a crack.Ater calling several other glass replacement companies,I chose SafePro glass because of the friendly service and quick response replacing my windshield.Thank You.
item.content:encoded: After a rock hit my windshield,the nick started,to turn into a crack.Ater calling several other glass replacement companies,I chose SafePro glass because of the friendly service and quick response replacing my windshield.Thank You.

item.title: By: Monty
item.dc:creator: Monty
item.description: I received excellent service from SafePro. Everyone was very helpful, kind, professional and cheerful. The service tech was very kind as well and performed the job in less than an hour. Great work from a great company!
item.content:encoded: I received excellent service from SafePro. Everyone was very helpful, kind, professional and cheerful. The service tech was very kind as well and performed the job in less than an hour. Great work from a great company!

item.title: By: Mandy Giles
item.dc:creator: Mandy Giles
item.description: Fantastic customer serivce, ask for Rafel he is well versed in product knowledge and very nice. Thank you for all of your help will be referring friends and family!!
item.content:encoded: Fantastic customer serivce, ask for Rafel he is well versed in product knowledge and very nice. Thank you for all of your help will be referring friends and family!!

item.title: By: Bertha sexton
item.dc:creator: Bertha sexton
item.description: Marie was very helpful and professional grate costumer service it was quick and easy I would definitely refer SafePro Auto Glass Thanks Maria
item.content:encoded: Marie was very helpful and professional grate costumer service it was quick and easy I would definitely refer SafePro Auto Glass Thanks Maria

item.title: By: Rod Williams
item.dc:creator: Rod Williams
item.description: Had our windshield replaced today, came right to the door. Proffesionalism and courtesy was spot on. Would recommend your service to any one, thanks to all involved, Maria, Rafeal, George and Able.
item.content:encoded: Had our windshield replaced today, came right to the door. Proffesionalism and courtesy was spot on. Would recommend your service to any one, thanks to all involved, Maria, Rafeal, George and Able.

item.title: By: Diana Cross
item.dc:creator: Diana Cross
item.description: Safe pro made replacing 3 cracked windshields nearly effortless. Chris was very professional and fast and the technician was timely and efficient. The company gave me a substantial cash incentive for using their services as well. It was truly a win win situation and I am left with great looking windshields.
item.content:encoded: Safe pro made replacing 3 cracked windshields nearly effortless. Chris was very professional and fast and the technician was timely and efficient. The company gave me a substantial cash incentive for using their services as well. It was truly a win win situation and I am left with great looking windshields.

item.title: By: Domenic
item.dc:creator: Domenic
item.description: Kelsey was extremely pleasant and helpful over the phone and I was very impressed with how seamless the entire process was. The installation was done quickly and actually the same day as the insurance approval.
item.content:encoded: Kelsey was extremely pleasant and helpful over the phone and I was very impressed with how seamless the entire process was. The installation was done quickly and actually the same day as the insurance approval.

item.title: By: Tera Weech
item.dc:creator: Tera Weech
item.description: This is my second time using SafePro and they did another fabulous job! They are professional, and easy to work with. I will definitely use them again.
item.content:encoded: This is my second time using SafePro and they did another fabulous job! They are professional, and easy to work with. I will definitely use them again.
